channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report X-2024050049
item.description:
Report X-2024050049

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-03T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-25
  • City: WARWICK
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE ON TAN BELT SPOT 189. THE PACKAGE WAS UPRIGHT ON GRATES. HAD AN OXIDIZER AND CORROSIVE DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL. HAD A UN SPEC # AND ORIENTATION ARROWS. SHIPPING PAPERS. DECISION TREE WAS FOLLOWED AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
